metadata.title: CVE-2016-9801 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: In BlueZ 5.42, a buffer overflow was observed in "set_ext_ctrl" function in "tools/parser/l2cap.c" source file when processing corrupted dump file.

notes.note: mdeslaur> as of 2020-02-07, appears unfixed crash in hcidump command line tool only

criterions.comment: bluez package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
